title: rustc panics when run on a directory

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I tried running `rustc` on a directory, just to see what would happen. I expected it would error out cleanly. Instead (run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full`):
```
error: unknown start of token: \u{3}
 --> .:1:1
  |
1 | 
  | ^

error: unknown start of token: \u{0}
 --> .:1:2
  |
1 | 
  | ^

error: unknown start of token: \u{0}
 --> .:1:3
  |
1 | 
  | ^

error: unknown start of token: \u{0}
 --> .:1:4
  |
1 | 
  | ^

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_session/config.rs:474:57
stack backtrace:
   0:        0x80113416b - <std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::DisplayBacktrace as core::fmt::Display>::fmt::h6f3466a46ea1fa71
   1:        0x80117c94d - core::fmt::write::h4b3edf88f8821136
   2:        0x801119412 - <unknown>
   3:        0x80110cbb8 - <unknown>
   4:        0x80110c914 - <unknown>
   5:        0x8035966c8 - rustc_driver::report_ice::hfb8c91a979a11aee
   6:        0x80110d1aa - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h7581696dce7a5dca
   7:        0x80110cdbc - rust_begin_unwind
   8:        0x80117a7f0 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h3090bfb5a1bab73b
   9:        0x80117a748 - core::panicking::panic::h875be7b3aac2ca74
  10:        0x808033329 - rustc_session::config::Input::filestem::h1ce567152a0eed98
  11:        0x8037ba40f - rustc_interface::util::build_output_filenames::h5bd25d47ef82cb53
  12:        0x803736f23 - <unknown>
  13:        0x803757051 - rustc_interface::queries::Queries::prepare_outputs::h9577dd08303e86f2
  14:        0x80354fa47 - <unknown>
  15:        0x8035f3228 - <unknown>
  16:        0x803550c16 - <unknown>
  17:        0x80357bce1 - <unknown>
  18:        0x8035a6c07 - <unknown>
  19:        0x8035a80c6 - <unknown>
  20:        0x80355eda0 - <unknown>
  21:        0x801114e8b - <unknown>
  22:        0x8011c1736 - thread_start
                               at /usr/src/lib/libthr/thread/thr_create.c:292

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.46.0-nightly running on x86_64-unknown-freebsd

query stack during panic:
end of query stack
error: aborting due to 4 previous errors

```

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.46.0-nightly
binary: rustc
commit-hash: unknown
commit-date: unknown
host: x86_64-unknown-freebsd
release: 1.46.0-nightly
LLVM version: 10.0
```

OS is FreeBSD 12.1-RELEASE-p6.
